Class FourierCorrelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.algorithm.FourierCorrelation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class FourierCorrelation
extends Object
implements SinglebandImageProcessor<Float,FImage>
    FImage correlation performed using an FFT.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • processImage

        public void processImage(FImage image)
        Description copied from interface: ImageProcessor
        Process an image. Implementing classes must alter the image passed in-place or assign the output to the input using Image.internalAssign(Image).
        Specified by:
        processImage in interface ImageProcessor<FImage>
        Parameters:

      • correlate

        public static FImage correlate(FImage image,
                               FImage template,
                               boolean inplace)
        Correlate an image with a kernel using an FFT.
        Parameters:
        image - The image
        template - The template to correlate with the image
        inplace - if true, then output overwrites the input, otherwise a new image is created.
        Returns:
        correlation map
